Articles.Content: Greetings KSP community, I remember playing the Atari arcade game Lunar Lander as a kid (yes, I\'m old) and now finally we have Kerbal Space Program! No questions yet but I\'m sure I\'ll have some. I\'m getting the hang of my orbital mechanics and am looking forward to exploring the soon to be added planetary system. Happy exploration to all.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
welcome aboard! Just dont destroy TO many rockets lol
